media:group.media:title: Spanish Meditation for Spanish Students
media:group.media:description:
This is a 5 minute meditation in slow Spanish to create some calm while learning a language. Click on settings on the video toolbar if you would prefer subtitles in English or Spanish. You may also try to listen to understand with the gestures that I provide. 

Linguist and educator Stephen Krashen states that fear and anxiety to learn a language creates an "affective filter" that obstructs one's ability to learn a language. I hope this Spanish meditation helps to lower your affective filter so that you can absorb Spanish with a calmer mind, body and spirit.

For more yoga and meditation videos in English, visit:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqbOktTkVMsPBkJDNf0y41w/
